mapper.select: select * from cl_assess a left join cl_orders b on a.orders_id=b.orders_id left join cl_record c on b.record_id=c.record_id left join gg_brand d on d.brand_id=a.brand_id left join gg_design e on a.design_id=e.design_id left join gg_color f on a.color_id=f.color_id order by b.orders_time

mapper.update:
update cl_assess
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_card = #{assessCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_type = #{assessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_drive = #{assessDrive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_engine = #{assessEngine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_tap = #{assessTap,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_transfer_times = #{assessTransferTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assess_license = #{assessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_appraise = #{assessAppraise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_newcar_price = #{assessNewcarPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
assess_office = #{assessOffice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
assess_user = #{assessUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_review = #{assessReview,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_note = #{assessNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
design_id = #{designId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assess_variator = #{assessVariator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assess_displacement = #{assessDisplacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess_mileage = #{assessMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assess_begain = #{assessBegain,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where assess_id = #{assessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cl_assess set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_card = #{assessCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_type = #{assessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_drive = #{assessDrive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_engine = #{assessEngine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_tap = #{assessTap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_transfer_times = #{assessTransferTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assess_license = #{assessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_appraise = #{assessAppraise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_newcar_price = #{assessNewcarPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, assess_office = #{assessOffice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, assess_user = #{assessUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_review = #{assessReview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_note = #{assessNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, design_id = #{designId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assess_variator = #{assessVariator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assess_displacement = #{assessDisplacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_mileage = #{assessMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assess_begain = #{assessBegain,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where assess_id = #{assessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
